items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made for tall people. Small size but not for petites
items.body: Too big but beautiful Read more
items.author: LS Shopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and true to size
items.body: Peacock is a perfect dark teal. Size 16 is true to size. I’m 5'6" and it is about 3" too long barefooted- so I’m looking for 3" heals. Has modest built in cups about a size C. Fully lined including sheet lining on lace jacket. Jacket sleeves are bracelet length. Very good value for the price! However I do need to mention that I had delivery issues with first order not being delivered properly. I ordered two colors and only one dress arrived. However, vender fully refunded the undelivered dress and I returned the other (dusty blue - true to color but too blue for our color scheme). Read more
items.author: CarolAnn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, well made dress
items.body: Shipping on this item took several weeks, but arrived within the timeframe noted when I placed the order. The manufacturer made the dress well, however the bodice includes boning, which I felt made it a bit awkward. I'm tall (5'9") and the dress is still several inches too long. I wouldn't be able to wear this dress without having alterations done. I do think it's a lovely color, and would be a nice dress for older ladies. Read more
items.author: Sallie Dawkins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: The dress is beautiful and the material is of good quality. The lace jacket over the dress is stunning!! I found the size runs small. So I had to return it for a larger size. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Pea-green, Dusty-purple, Mulbreey-purple, Rust-red, Fuchsia, Black, Champagne, Light-blue, Emerald-green, Royal-blue, Peacock, Desert-rose, Lavender. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
